sentences.en: And regarding that name of Pross, likewise.
sentences.cn: 还有普洛丝这个姓, 也请你解释解释.

sentences.en: He lent money, made donations and encouraged others to do likewise.
sentences.cn: 他又借钱又捐款捐物，并且鼓励别人也这样做。

sentences.en: He voted for the change and he expected his colleagues to do likewise .
sentences.cn: 他投票赞成变革并期望他的同事投同样的票。

sentences.en: Heaven, likewise, had frowned upon her, and she had not died.
sentences.cn: 上天也同样向她皱眉, 但她活了过来.

sentences.en: Her speech and her manner likewise upset me.
sentences.cn: 她的言谈使我心烦意乱,她的举止也一样.

sentences.en: If the note of D is sounded on a harp, all the corresponding D strings of other octaves will likewise resonate.
sentences.cn: 如果用竖琴演奏D音符，其他八度音阶所有相应的D弦都将发出共鸣。

sentences.en: Likewise directories themselves you should be able to annotate.
sentences.cn: 同样地目录他们自己你应该可以注解.

sentences.en: Likewise wot I'll stand by you, right or wrong. "
sentences.cn: “而且我总是拥护你的, 不管你对不对. ”

sentences.en: Mary must go home now, and Alden likewise.
sentences.cn: 玛丽现在要回家, 奥尔登也要回去.

sentences.en: Nanny put on a shawl and told the girls to do likewise.
sentences.cn: 南妮披上披肩，并叫女孩们也这样做。

sentences.en: The clams were delicious. Likewise, the eggplant was excellent.
sentences.cn: 蛤蜊味道鲜美，茄子也同样美味。

sentences.en: The entire staff of the Ministry had done likewise.
sentences.cn: 部里的全体工作人员也都已回来.

sentences.en: The V2 was not an ordinary weapon: it could only be used against cities. Likewise the atom bomb.
sentences.cn: V2火箭并非普通武器：它只能用于对付城市。原子弹也是这样。

sentences.en: These requests are ignored. His requests for rent are likewise sometimes ignored.
sentences.cn: 这些要求被置之不理。他关于支付租金的要求有时也同样未被理睬。
留心看着他并且照样做.

sentences.en: Will wanted to do likewise, but felt too discomfited.
sentences.cn: 威尔也想照着做，但觉得太难堪了。
